Package model.heroState

package model.heroState
  • Interface Summary
    Interface
    Description
    HeroState
    The state of the hero.
  • Class Summary
    Class
    Description
    Hero
    A Hero is a DynamicObject that is controllable by the player.
    InvincibleState
    A state of the hero which won't die when colliding with enemy or enemy projectile.
    NormalState
    Normal state can shoot can shield and will die after collision with enemies and projectiles.
    ShieldState
    Shield state cannot shoot won't die after collision with enemies and projectiles.
    StunState
    Stun state cannot move.
